content: As an AI language model, I don't have access to the current status or statistics of Boland. However, historically, Boland has been a hub for agriculture, wine production, and manufacturing industries such as textile, clothing, and furniture. With its well-developed transportation infrastructure and access to ports, Boland has also attracted many logistics and distribution companies. Additionally, the technology and research sectors have also been growing in the region, with a focus on renewable energy and biotechnology.
